author: noreply@blogger.com (dinesh prabhu)
title: UPSC Recruitment 2017, UPSC Exam 2017 (227 Vacancies Opening)
text:
Last Updated Saturday, February 11, 2017 Advertisement 
The Union Public Service Commission (UPSC) latest recruitment notification and current examination details listed in the page. UPSC is India's central agency conducting recruitment to various ministerial department services and posts under the Union through conduct of competitive examinations and the Recruitment to services & posts under the Central Government by Selection through Interview. 
UPSC Recruitment Mode : The UPSC recruitment is made by three methods:- Direct Recruitment, Promotion and Transfer (Deputation) Basis. The UPSC Direct Recruitment for selection of Various department posts of Central Government of India. The selection based on Interview or Written Test / Trade Test followed by Personal Interview. 
UPSC Competitive Examination : The UPSC agency authorized to conduct various competitive exams for appointment of Civil Service Posts of the Union. The UPSC conducting exams such as Civil Services Examination, Engineering Services Examination, Combined Defence Services (CDS) Examination, National Defence Academy Examination, Naval Academy Examination, Combined Medical Services (CMS) Examination, Special Class Railway Apprentice (SCRA), Indian Economic Service (IES) / Indian Statistical Service Examination (ISS), Combined Geoscientists & Geologists Examination, and Central Armed Police Forces (Assistant Commandant) Examination. 
UPSC Exam Notification 2017 List: [Last updated on 11th February 2017 ] Exam Name
